Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at So Park Battersea Aparthotel places you in the heart of London, convenient to Battersea Park and Buckingham Palace. This 4-star aparthotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Big Ben.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and DVD players. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11 AM for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and DVD players. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

A stay at So Park Battersea Aparthotel places you in the heart of London, convenient to Battersea Park and Buckingham Palace. This 4-star aparthotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Big Ben.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Battersea Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sloane Square - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Stamford Bridge Stadium - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Victoria Palace Theatre - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Natural History Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Tate Britain - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Harrods - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
The Oval - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Imperial College London - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Buckingham Palace - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
St. James Park - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Houses of Parliament - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
The Supreme Court - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 35.4 km / 22 mi

The preferred airport for So Park Battersea Aparthotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: As Battersea Park Train Station is less than a 10-minute walk away, you can travel around the capital with ease from So Park Battersea. In less than a five-minute journey you’ll be at Victoria Station, from where you can stroll to Buckingham Palace and Westminster Abbey. Travel just three minutes in the other direction and you’ll come to Clapham Junction with its array of bars, restaurants and shops.
